attributes.additional_details: By cancelling 2022 exams for A Level, it will allow students to feel more at ease as current Year 12s can’t do any sort of exams. Therefore, I want the government to replace them with something more helpful.
attributes.background: I want the government to cancel A level exams next year as current Year 12s have no experience in exams whatsoever. The government could perhaps give assessments rather than exams so that they will be able to still be graded but through a different way as exams will be extremely hard for them.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566760
